column4: did you get an answer to your question?  I've been trying to find the same thing
I'm trying to figure out how to have my secondary drive automount
I know it's probably somewhere in /etc/fstab but I get scared messing with that.
I know how to do it manually but really hate trying to teach n00bs like my father to edit a text file like fstab
and I've used Linux since 96' exclusively.
If you want I can help...fstab isn't so scary... :)
but I would much rather know how to point and click to get the same job done.. ;)
ahhh  You are looking for a tool for your Dad
yep...I got no problems with fstab....
hmm actually that's a good thing to google I think.  gui fstab
plus it isn't part of the core...There has to be something the Ubuntu devs thought was worthy... ;)
